author: yeckang
body:
#### PR description:

This PR modifies GEMDigitization simulation.
* The DigiProducers of GEM and ME0 has moved to plugins.
* GEMTrivialModel has removed, because it isn't be used anymore.
* GEMSimpleModel has spliced as a signal model and noise models.
* The fillDescription has added for GEMDigiProducer.

#### PR validation:

* Code style has fixed with `scram build code-format` command.
* runTheMatrix.py is runnable. 
* The result has not changed for GEM.
* The simulation result has validated in [GEM DPG](https://indico.cern.ch/event/823672/contributions/3444716/attachments/1852072/3040845/GEMDigiUpdate.pdf).

@jshlee @watson-ij
title: Gem digitization update
